metadata.synopsis: PAD when the player is kicked out of the Baldurs Mouth Gazette after talking to Ettvard for the first time.
metadata.how_to_trigger: After talking to Ettvard Needle, agree to leave rather than fight. Position is roughly 53, 37, -53 in CTY_Main_A

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Dammit - if that story goes to print, we're in trouble.
